Text.value: Multifunction Sensor (Diffuse, T-Beam, Retro, BGS) and more
Sets switchpoint-logic, -mode (hysteresis can not be set)
Reduced service life, replace sensor during next maintenance cycle
End of service life, replace sensor immediately
Low stress level: everything OK, a long service life can be expected.
Medium stress level: thermal load not optimum, accelerated aging.
High stress level: Poor internal thermal state, service life at serious risk.
